hero.title: N0HACKS
hero.sub_title: Elite cyber specialists to help you secure your digital assets

about.title: Experts who safeguard your digital world — relentlessly.
about.body_1: Security breaches, ransomware and targeted phishing campaigns are no longer edge cases; they’re the norm. A serious defence strategy is the only way to avoid becoming another headline or ransom note.
about.body_2: N0HACKS is a team of security specialists with experience across high-stakes engagements and complex infrastructures. We combine red teaming, digital forensics and strategic cyber intelligence to expose real attack paths before criminals do. Every engagement is built around detail, verification and clear risk reduction.

bullets.attacker_mindset_body: We simulate motivated adversaries, not just scanners or checklist audits.
bullets.end_to_end_body: From first compromise paths to remediation and retesting, we stay in the loop.
bullets.detail_body: Clear narratives, actionable findings and no generic copy-paste reporting.
bullets.high_risk_body: Startups, fintech, healthcare, Web3 and any stack where failure is expensive.

about.why_body: We treat every engagement as if an incident has already happened. That means realistic threat modelling, chained exploits and a clear path to hardening your environment.

items.recon_body: OSINT, infra mapping and discovery of high-value entry points just like a real adversary would.
items.exploit_body: From phishing and credential stuffing to web vulns and cloud misconfigs, we walk the full kill chain.
items.remediate_title: We help you close every path.
items.remediate_body: Prioritized fixes, architecture guidance and retesting until your real risk drops to acceptable levels.

cisco.title: CISO as a Service
cisco.body: Executive-level cybersecurity leadership, architecture, and threat oversight — delivered as an always-on service for organizations that demand resilience, clarity, and control.

cards.card1_body: Continuous identity verification, granular segmentation, and adaptive policy enforcement across all users, devices, and workloads.
cards.card2_body: End-to-end automation, intelligent alert correlation, and orchestrated real-time response across endpoints, cloud environments, and critical infrastructure.
cards.card3_body: Proactive risk assessments, compliance alignment, advanced threat modeling, and security posture refinement guided by CISO-level expertise.

world.title: Global Threat Activity
world.body: Live visualization of global attack attempts and defensive operations powered by N0HACKS.

horizontal.title: High-touch services for critical teams.
horizontal.subtitle: A horizontal stream of capabilities you can plug in based on where you’re exposed the most.

services.s1_body: High-touch protection for founders, C-suite and key personas across devices and platforms.
services.s2_body: Rapid response to phishing, spoofed domains and fake profiles abusing your brand.
services.s3_body: Forensics and verification for large transfers, exits and strategic deals.
services.s4_body: Direct access to senior operators when something feels off or breaks in production.
services.s5_body: Targeted reviews of critical workloads, identities and IAM policies.
services.s6_body: Patterns, anomalies and abuse campaigns mapped to your products.

capabilities.title: Offensive capabilities. End-to-end.
capabilities.body: From red teaming and fraud investigation to code audits, N0HACKS covers the full kill chain.

cards.c1_body: Full-spectrum adversary simulations against apps, infra and people.
cards.c2_body: Abuse real attack paths from perimeter to core systems.
cards.c3_body: Targeted campaigns to measure and harden human attack surface.
cards.c4_body: Rogue APs, weak crypto and lateral pivoting from wireless.
cards.c5_body: OSINT, dark web and data exposure monitoring for key personas.
cards.c6_body: Tracing digital trails, infrastructure and actors behind fraud.
cards.c7_body: Threat intel mapped to your business model and geography.
cards.c8_body: Controlled traffic exercises to stress-test resilience.
cards.c9_title: Web, IoT, Cloud & Source Code Audits
cards.c9_body: Deep reviews of critical surfaces and engineering practices.

contact.title: Stop hoping you’re secure. Start knowing.
contact.body: Whether you’re reacting to a live incident or hardening before the next move, we plug directly into your team and work the problem end-to-end — from first signal to verified fix.

bullets.b2: Clear priorities, realistic attack paths, zero fluff.
bullets.b3: Designed for founders, CISOs and high-velocity teams.

contact.card_body: Share a few details and we’ll respond with a focused, operator-level plan — not a sales script.

form.message_placeholder: Briefly describe your stack, incident or concern.

contact.disclaimer: No spam. No mailing list. You get direct contact with the N0HACKS team.

footer.description: Elite offensive security operators. Red teaming, intelligence, forensics and incident-driven defence for companies who cannot afford failure.
footer.contact_body: Need rapid engagement or incident response? Our operators answer directly. No sales layer.
